about_the_game:
The Art of EVERSPACE 2 is an explorative behind-the-scenes look at the visual development of one of the most expansive space adventures ever released from an independent video game studio.

In this digital artbook, you’ll find a showcase of work that covers over six years of development—hundreds of images used by the ROCKFISH Games developer team to create their award-winning adventure. From initial sketches to final concept art, discover inspirations for environments, ships, characters, boss battles, and cinematic set pieces created for a game that spans multiple star systems.

Featuring more than 280 pages of concept art and more from Tobias Frank and the ROCKFISH Games art team, this is a must-have for EVERSPACE fans and science fiction art enthusiasts.

16 4k wallpapers featuring gorgeous environments from the star systems of EVERSPACE 2 and an 8k starmap are also included in this package.
